name: UNLOCK
description: UNLOCK is the utility/governance token for the 200 Keys Ecosystem. The token provides the following utility: DAO VOTING POWER - Stake UNLOCK to gain DAO influence with longer staking resulting in greater voting power. REWARDS - Staking UNLOCK gives you a proportional share of daily 3500 UNLOCK emissions. MINTING - Use UNLOCK to mint NFTs created with the 200 Keys NFT Forge. MINT VISION - When minting NFTs from the Forge, you can burn UNLOCK to see multiple revealed random NFTs and then choose the best one.
